nodes.text: The Cybernetics Lab was a cybernetic laboratories located on Naboo's swamp moon of Rori during the time of the Galactic Civil War.
In operation after the Battle of Yavin, this particular laboratory was located on the edge of the city of Narmle.

Circa 1 ABY, the Aqualish criminal Ponda Baba break into the lab in order to find a cybernetic arm to replace the one he lost in Mos Eisley. Lieutenant Orden Tarc of the Royal Naboo Security Forces later tasked a spacer with investigating a series of cybernetic lab break-ins, starting with the one in Narmle. After using a research data console within the lab, it was determined that an individual by the name of Ponda Baba had recently logged onto the system, despite never having worked in the laboratory. Lieutenant Tarc and the spacer eventually confronted Ponda Baba but the latter fled and escaped the system.

The Cybernetics Lab on Rori was a location in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011. The Cybernetics Lab was added to the game with the release of the "Game Update 12", on August 10, 2009.
